Ingredients.9: 0.5 cup warm water (100 to 110 degrees F)

Ingredients.11: 4.0 cups all-purpose flour, or more if needed

Ingredients.15: 0.5 teaspoons Spice Islands® Ground Saigon Cinnamon

Ingredients.19: 1 teaspoon Spice Islands® 100% Pure Bourbon Vanilla Extract

Ingredients.20: 5 tablespoons milk, or more as needed

Directions.1: Combine potatoes, potato water, butter, sugar, salt and hot water in large mixing bowl. Stir until butter melts; set aside and let cool. Combine yeast and 1/2 cup warm water in small bowl. Let rest 5 minutes. Add eggs, 2 cups flour and yeast mixture to potato mixture. Beat until well mixed. Continue adding flour, 1 cup at a time until soft dough forms.

Directions.2: Knead on a lightly floured surface until smooth and elastic (about 4 to 6 minutes), OR knead with electric mixer using dough hook. Place in a greased bowl, turning to coat. Cover.

Directions.3: Let rise in a warm, draft free area about 1 hour, until doubled in size. Punch dough down; divide in half.

Directions.4: Roll one portion of dough on a lightly floured surface to a 12 x 18-inch rectangle. Spread with half the butter. Combine sugar and cinnamon; sprinkle half of the mixture over surface. Roll up tightly lengthwise, sealing edges. Cut into 12 slices. Place in greased 13 x 9-inch pan. Repeat with remaining dough. Cover.

Directions.5: Let rise 30 to 45 minutes until nearly doubled.

Directions.6: Bake in preheated 350 degrees F oven for 25 to 30 minutes.

Directions.7: Cool for 15 minutes. Combine icing ingredients and drizzle over rolls.
